channel.title: Union Square on Table41NYC
channel.description: Recent content in Union Square on Table41NYC

item.title: Casa Mono
item.description: Stumbled into here while drunk. I recall it was pretty good, but I don’t remember what was ordered. Had no idea this had Michelin stars either. When I walked in, it was all empty.

item.title: Barn Joo
item.description: Pretty good Korean American bar food outside of k-town. Not too expensive I think.

item.title: Tsurutontan
item.description: Pretty decent udon. Got the kimchi jigae variant. A bit sweet and would try something else. Came back here another time, and the basic variant was probably better than everything else. Some of the fancier udon variants are just not that great.

item.title: La Maison Du Croque Monsieur
item.description: The croque monsieur was mediocre at best.

item.title: Dear Irving
item.description: Good old boys bar. Think jazzy-ish. Nice place.
